trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding"></xref> or an <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a URI representing the encoding style used to encode the SOAP header.
The value of this property should be set only if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.
A string containing a URI.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets the extension type controlling the output in a WSDL document for the `headerfault` XML element of a SOAP header.
This property did not exist in version 1.0 of the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderFaultBinding"></xref> representing the SOAP header types used to transmit error information.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> instance is mapped to a specific property in generated proxy classes.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> maps to a specific property; otherwise `false`.

Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> within the XML Web service to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> applies.
The default value of this property is an empty string ("").
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> representing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref>.

Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specification for encoding of content not specifically defined by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Encoding"></xref> property.
This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set.
The value should only be set if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.
A string representing a URI.

Gets or sets a value indicating to which <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> within the XML Web service the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> applies.
A string representing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding"></xref> applies.

Specifies whether the header is encoded using rules specified by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapHeaderBinding.Encoding"></xref> property, or is encapsulated within a concrete XML schema.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> values.
The default is `Default`.
